summary: Giving 2 new books and changing the bedroom in breezehome. More will come with time and newer updates.
descriptionHtml:
2 New books:
Shogun\'s Update Vol. 1
Lore\'s of Smite Vol. 1 (Hindu) <-- More coming (Roman, Greek, Egytian)

Changes to bedroom:
New bed, Chest moved, Bookshelf added, (Imperial) Map added to wall, New entrance to bedroom (secret entrance), changed wall when looking towards the room entrance, New carpets, New 2 seat stone table in bedroom.

New weapon:
Shogun\'s Katana

NOTE: The reason to why it\'s named Shogun\'s Update is because i use the name Shogunate as i use the name ThePirateOfLand the \"Update\" part of the name came from it being a replacement and adding stuff to the game and therefor a update. Shogun\'s Update is not a update for any plugin but is the name of a plugin itself. Enjoy my \"Mod\" and feel free to modify it as long as my name is mentioned.
author: ThePirateOfLand
